root:
^Born in December17, 1905, in a small municipality of Raujarvi near the Russian border  
The seventh son of a farmer, Simo Hayha was not only a farmer, but also hunter and a skier  
He spends his youth outside the forest playing shooting games with his bolt-action sniper rifle  
Press [F] to continue

^At the age of 17 he won several shooting competitions
At the age of 19, Simo undergone his mandatory military service
